title: Best of The Herd: 11/12/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/12/2019
description:
Colin says there is no MVP debate because it's Russell Wilson and it's not even close. He thinks people are being way too critical of Jimmy Garoppolo after a tough loss on Monday night. He says the Cowboys are showing a really troubling trait and explains what it is. Plus, Kobe Bryant called Tony Allen the toughest defender he ever faced and Tony joins the show to talk about defending greats like LeBron and Kobe and why he isn't a fan of load management.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
